name: 運動生物力學專題研究
goals: Understand the kinematic, kinetic, and electromyography principal theory and application.
Acquire the 2D, 3D images, force plate, and electromyography data collection and analysis.
Learn to read and review sports biomechanics research papers.
Understand modern sports biomechanics research trends.
syllabus:
16+2 weeks

week 1    Historical aspects of biomechanical analyses  
week 2   Photo-optical issues and lenses  
week 3   Kinematics I  
week 4   Kinematics II  
week 5   Kinetics I  
week 6   Kinetics II  
week 7   2D motion analysis and force plate I  
week 8   2D motion analysis and force plate II

week 9   Introduction to 3D motion analysis I

week 10  Introduction to 3D motion analysis II

week 11  EMG I

week 12  EMG II

week 13  paper review and presentation I

week 14  paper review and presentation II

week 15  paper review and presentation III

week 15  paper review and presentation IV

week 16  Final exam

methodologies.note: Discussion with students related to the biomechanics topics
group work in the lab sessions
data collection and analysis in lab sessions
movie and video presentation in the class
paper review and discussion in the class

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
